channel.title: Mantichora's Big Brain Setup For Big Brains [Setup Idea]
channel.description: So here's the next Competetive that i want to run, but it's a 22'er and features VTs so it might be difficult to run. That's why I'm running it past ya'll first yee > > 22 players. > 48/24 phases. > **Absoloutely no info is revealed upon player flip.** > Vengeful only triggers upon lynch. > > *The big brain setup for big brains* > > [color=green]**Village Seer (w/o N0) > Village Seer (w/o N0) > Village Jailkeeper > Village Vigilante > Village 1-shot Vigilante > Vengeful Villager > Vanilla Villager > Vanilla Villager > Vanilla Villager > Vanilla Villager > Vanilla Villager > Vanilla Villager > Vanilla Villager > Vanilla Villager > Vanilla Villager > Vanilla Villager > Vanilla Villager > Vanilla Villager > Vanilla Villager**[/color] > > [color=brown]**Wolf Vigilante > Wolf Role Cop > Wolf Universal Backup (can only backup wolves) > Wolf Vengeful Suicide Bomber > Wolf JOAT (1-shot Framer / 1-shot Jailkeeper)**[/color] > > # REAL SHIT
